title: At CII partnership meet, Naidu hails Andhra as investment hub
text:
Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu said Andhra Pradesh was able to attract investments of $20 billion, providing employment opportunities to 20 lakh youth, over the past 18 months.

Delivering the keynote address at the inaugural session of the 30th CII Partnership Summit 2025 held at Andhra University grounds in Visakhapatnam, he also expressed hope that the government would be able to attract $500 billion in three years to provide employment opportunities to 50 lakh youth. Andhra Pradesh is gifted with natural resources and a long coastline, which stands as a gateway for investments in several sectors, he said.
